sourcesContent:
<mat-card class="min-width">

  <mat-card-content>
    <mat-toolbar color="primary">Detalhes do curso</mat-toolbar>
  
    <form [formGroup]="form">
      <mat-form-field class="full-width">
        <input matInput formControlName="name" placeholder="Nome">
      </mat-form-field>

      <mat-form-field class="full-width">
        <input matInput formControlName="category" placeholder="Categoria">
      </mat-form-field>
    </form>
  </mat-card-content>

  <mat-card-actions>
    <button mat-raised-button color="primary" (click)="onSubmit()">Salvar</button>
    <button mat-raised-button (click)="onCancel()">Cancelar</button>
  </mat-card-actions>

</mat-card>
